spa_service_desc: This type of spa service involves the manipulation of soft tissues in the body to promote relaxation and relieve muscle tension.
Facials are a popular spa service that involves the cleansing, exfoliation, and nourishment of the skin on the face..
Body treatments often involve exfoliation, detoxification, and moisturization of the skin on the entire body.
These services focus on the care and maintenance of the nails, as well as providing a relaxing and pampering experience.
Some spas also offer hair services, such as cuts, styling, coloring, and treatments.
Waxing is a popular spa service for removing unwanted hair from various parts of the body.
Aromatherapy is a holistic spa service that uses essential oils to promote relaxation, improve mood, and enhance overall well-being.

spa_service_img: /Gallery/Spa Images/Saunas and Steam Rooms spa img.jpg
spa_service_desc: These services involve sitting in a heated room or using steam to promote sweating and release toxins from the body.
These activities can help reduce stress, improve flexibility and strength, and promote overall mind-body balance.
Medical spas offer services that are more medically-focused, such as Botox injections, laser treatments, and chemical peels.
